<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin"></a>

# GridMapEditorPlugin

**Inherits:** [EditorPlugin](EditorPlugin.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Editor for [GridMap](GridMap.md) nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

GridMapEditorPlugin provides access to the [GridMap](GridMap.md) editor functionality.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_clear_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_selection**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_clear_selection)

Deselects any currently selected cells.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_current_grid_map"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[GridMap](GridMap.md) **get_current_grid_map**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_current_grid_map)

Returns the [GridMap](GridMap.md) node currently edited by the grid map editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_cells"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md) **get_selected_cells**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_cells)

Returns an array of [Vector3i](Vector3i.md)\\ s with the selected cells' coordinates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_palette_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_selected_palette_item**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_palette_item)

Returns the index of the selected [MeshLibrary](MeshLibrary.md) item in the grid map editor's palette or ``-1`` if no item is selected.

\ **Note:** The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AABB](AABB.md) **get_selection**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selection)

Returns the cell coordinate bounds of the current selection. Use [has_selection()](GridMapEditorPlugin.md#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection) to check if there is an active selection.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_selection**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection)

Returns ``true`` if there are selected cells.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selected_palette_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_selected_palette_item**\ (\ item\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selected_palette_item)

Selects the [MeshLibrary](MeshLibrary.md) item with the given index in the grid map editor's palette. If a negative index is given, no item will be selected. If a value greater than the last index is given, the last item will be selected.

\ **Note:** The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_selection**\ (\ begin\: [Vector3i](Vector3i.md), end\: [Vector3i](Vector3i.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selection)

Selects the cells inside the given bounds from `begin` to `end`.
